name: Blind Little Girl !
description:
Concept

This game was developed by Eloi Strée during the No Screen Jam of Antwerpen.
The theme was to develop a game in 48h without screens at all !

So I decided to do a blind game with VR headset... Why ?
Just because I can xD

How to play ?

On Oculus:
- Escape: do sound in front of you to be able to understand where are wall
- Mouse left: Make you move forward
- Head rotation: Look where to go
- Arrow move: forward, left, right, back

On Gear VR:
- Back button: do sound in front of you to be able to understand where are wall
- Track Pad: Make you move forward
- Head rotation: Look where to go

On Cardboard:
- Not available yet

With Stick phone:
If you have an other Android device that you do not use,
you can install the stick apk that give you possibility to have joystick via Wifi.
(Usefull for GearVR/Cardboard)

Visualizer:
If you wanna show to a public a map of the maze with info,
you can launch the Visualizer exe and be sure to be on the same wifi as the game is.

Debug cheat code:
- Spam Escape: show 3D scene
- Spam Click: to restart a game
